page.title: 15The Police,Sellindge 1985
page.content: The village Constable for this area is P.C.Cyril Hemsley.He and his wife live in the police house,which is also the village Police Station,some 30 yards from the A20 on the left along Swan Lane.He is responsible to Hythe and Folkestone stations but may be sent anywhere in Shepway Division.His main patrol area is Sellindge,Stanford and Monk's Horton,which he covers in a Ford Escort Saloon patrol car.However, he also walks his beat within each village.His job mainly entails patrolling roads and lanes in and around the villages and ensuring that farmers obey laws regarding animals, such as the burying of dead sheep.He also calls at private houses if necessary,but some of his duty time is spent completing paper work in his office.He has few policing problems as he finds the area quiet and peaceful.
